/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with brick buildings, their red and brown hues adding a warm tone to the overall color palette of the image. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the bustling city life. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The image is slightly blurry, adding a sense of motion and dynamism to the otherwise static urban landscape.
